notes: [Fixed] Fixed issue where the preparse field would generate an endless loop if the twig code produced a new result every time it was run. Flash variables are now used instead of comparing parse result.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where field is always visible inside Matrix blocks. (mmikkel)
[Fixed] Added support for displaying on element index pages. (carlcs)
[Fixed] Set generateTransformsBeforePageLoad = true before running twig. (brandonkelly)
[Fixed] Added support for displaying commerce element types on element index pages. (marionnewlevant)
[Fixed] Adds global config setting to disable in element index columns. (mildlygeeky)
